title: Apple Rolls Out Buy Now, Pay Later Plan
description: The tech company will let users apply for loans of as much $1,000 with no interest or fees.

title: Why Are Flip-Up Sunglasses Suddenly Everywhere?
description: Forget Dwayne Wayne. New styles from emergent adventuring companies like Pit Viper have made the dated design genuinely covetable. Here, three of our favorite versions.

title: Concertgoers Are Behaving Badly. Blame TikTok.
description: It isn’t just about the music anymore: Fans want their viral moment with a superstar.

title: The Jobs Most Exposed to ChatGPT
description: A new study finds that AI tools could more quickly handle at least half of the tasks that auditors, interpreters and writers do now.

title: For Chip Makers, a Choice Between the U.S. and China Looms
description: Washington seeks to steer the semiconductor supply chain using restrictions under the Chips Act.

title: U.S., Japan Strike Deal on Minerals Used in Batteries for Electric Cars
description: The move aims to address two of the Biden administration’s problems: its restrictions on EV subsidies and China’s supply-chain dominance.

title: Facebook Parent Plans Lower Bonus Payouts for Some Staff
description: Meta Platforms adjusts its performance review process, saying it is ‘optimizing’ for the year ahead.
